task.title: Setting up the machine
task.shortdesc: How to pre-clean and prepare the ice cream machine for use.

taskbody.context: You'll need a sink, soap, washcloth, freezer, and all of the ice cream machine parts.

step.cmd: Wipe down each part of the machine with a moist cloth
Wash the lid, freezer bowl and mixing arm in warm soapy water
Pre-freeze the freezer bowl for 12-24 hours after cleaning, preferably in the back of the freezer where it is coldest
WARNING: DO NOT IMMERSE THE MOTOR BASE IN WATER OR CLEAN ANY OF THE PARTS WITH ABRASIVE CLEANERS/HARD IMPLEMENTS
